page.title: 14HITCHIN ST MICHAELS CENTRE
page.content: The St Michael's Mount Community Centre is in St Michael's Road. All sorts of different things go on there from a playgroup to martial arts. My Mum is Warden there. She arranges the bookings for the hall,the Oxley Room (a kind of sitting room),the Committee room and the kitchen. She arranges the bookings so they do not clash and so there is enough time in between for cleaning. She has to go on Sundays to open up for the Jehovah's Witnesses. Some of the things that go on there are : Bingo, aerobics, all kinds of Karate, play- group, baby clinic, mother and toddler group, birthday, wedding and christen- ing parties. There are 2 store rooms, 1 Committee room,1 Office, 1 Hall, 1 kitchen, the Oxley Room, a foyer and a shop.
